header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Changing careers, and personal life goals and interests.
header.activity: A couple talking about future plans for a career change and how to set up a small business.
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, advising, requesting, making arrangements

speaker.fls: French -- level unspecified; German -- level unspecified
